education.description:
Currently studying Software Engineering since the fall of 2021.
‚Ä¢ Named Captain of ApplETS, a scientific club focused on mobile development. Working on and maintaining √âTSMobile 4.0, an application that allows students to view their grades, schedules, and important links. Used by over 10,000 students at my school.
‚Ä¢ Organized 3 events with key contributors (Intact and BNC) from ApplETS and held weekly meetings for the past year with our members.
‚Ä¢ Completed a course on algorithms (graphs, trees, search algorithms).
‚Ä¢ GPA: 3.46

Completed my DEC in Computer Science with a focus on management. Participated and nominated as the president of the security club in 2018 and 2019.
‚Ä¢ With the club, conducted evening courses on software security and organized a CTF (Capture The Flag) hacking competition between schools.
Designed a prototype for a dog food dispenser robot.
